# servosphereR

The goal of servosphereR is to make analyzing data generated by a SynTech servosphere easier, faster, and more intuitive. This package is contains a number of functions that should ease the work-flow of working with output files from the servosphere.

## Installation

Install either from CRAN with 

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("servosphereR")
```

Install development version from github with

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github("wittja01/servosphereR")
```


## Example

For a full introduction to the package and all the included functions, check out the vignette that accompanies this package (`browseVignettes("servosphereR")`).
